data.title: Trumba Press Release: International Film Festival
data.meta_description: Trumba offers web-hosted event calendar software for publishing online, interactive, calendars of events.
data.text:
Media Contact:

Matt Otepka

104° West Partners

206.855.7826

press@corp.trumba.com

TRUMBA TO POWER ONLINE EVENT CALENDAR

FOR INTERNATIONAL FILM FESTIVAL SUMMIT

Trumba Connect Provides Unique Scheduling Application

for Tracking Sessions During Film Festival Summit

SEATTLE, WA, November 27, 2006 – Trumba Corporation, a developer of innovative event marketing technology, announced today that the International Film Festival Summit (IFFS) will be using Trumba Connect to power its online event calendar for its annual Summit. The Conference & Expo will be held December 3-5 in Las Vegas. Trumba Connect allows organizations to effectively publish and promote events online and create an interactive, two-way communications vehicle between themselves and their customers.

Using Trumba Connect, the IFFS is able to offer a variety of display formats and a unique scheduling service for attendees to review session tracks, as well as select and add sessions to their personal calendars. In addition, attendees can e-mail specific events to friends and sign up to be reminded or notified via text messaging or e-mail if the event changes.

“We focused on creating an easy-to-use format and display for both our attendees and Web site visitors,” said Waco Hoover, president of the International Film Festival Summit. “Trumba Connect allows IFFS attendees to browse through events in a number of different formats segmented by subject or day. It is a great tool for our program because we have a number of tracks happening at the summit.”

The IFFS event calendar features relevant event information that connects attendees across the industry with descriptions of sessions to download and share with others. In addition, Trumba Connect enables the IFFS to easily maintain and update the session tracks so attendees are kept aware of current information.

“We have created a solution for organizations who want to promote their events and provide interactive, two-way communications between attendees, consumers or businesses,” said Jeremy Jaech, CEO of Trumba. “With Trumba Connect, attendees and other people interested in the International Film Festival Summit have an easy way to learn about specific sessions taking place during the show and a one-click ability to download sessions they want to attend onto their personal calendars. We’re pleased that the IFFS has made us their vendor of choice for communicating event information to their key constituents.”

The calendar of sessions for the upcoming International Film Festival Summit can be found by visiting http://www.filmfestivalsummit.com and clicking on the 2006 Program tab.

About Trumba

Trumba Corporation is a Seattle-based developer of innovative online calendaring solutions that help businesses and organizations effectively publish, promote and communicate their events online. The company’s flagship product, Trumba Connect, allows organizations to embed highly interactive and customizable calendars within their websites. Trumba customers also benefit from an array of event-centric tools that include the ability to email calendars, create categories of calendars based on event types or geography, leverage user-generated content through event submission forms, drop events onto an array of personal calendaring solutions and much more. Trumba technology is used by institutions of higher education, newspapers, corporations, associations, cities and towns, hospitals and large religious organizations. Trumba Connect is a subscription-based software as a service (SaaS) solution. The company is privately held and backed by three of the industry’s leading venture capital firms, including Kleiner Perkins Caufield & Byers, August Capital and Oak Investment Partners. To find out more about Trumba, visit www.trumba.com.

About International Film Festival Summit

The IFFS is dedicated to providing resources, information and avenues of communication for industry professionals, vendors, and anyone committed to the film festival industry. It is committed to the idea that film festivals are an important cultural celebration, a powerful voice in our society, and increasingly play a vital role in connecting not only the local communities they serve, but the world globally.
